Description: St Anthony the Hermit; seated in a landscape in frontal view; looking up to Christ on the Cross at left and writing in a book; the bell on the ground in front of him, the boar behind him. 1521 Engraving on discoloured paper
Bibliographic references: Pauli 1901-11 / Hans Sebald Beham: Ein Kritisches Verzeichniss seiner Kupferstiche Radirungen und Holzschnitte (68)
Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (68)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
